ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | lspsn0.z | |- .0. = ( 0g ` W ) |
| 2 |  | lspsn0.n | |- N = ( LSpan ` W ) |
| 3 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( LSubSp ` W ) = ( LSubSp ` W ) |
| 4 | 1, 3 | #P_lsssn0 | |- ( W e. LMod -> { .0. } e. ( LSubSp ` W ) ) |
| 5 | 3, 2 | #P_lspid | |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ { .0. } e. ( LSubSp ` W ) ) -> ( N ` { .0. } ) = { .0. } ) |
| 6 | 4, 5 | #P_mpdan | |- ( W e. LMod -> ( N ` { .0. } ) = { .0. } ) |
